body:
I think we should have a warning that `sparse` should be used only if weights are a leaf (maybe we should check it?). I'm afraid that doing it in any other case will result in weird errors in backward, since a lot of autograd functions can't handle sparse tensors.

BTW @ezyang @martinraison can we do sparse optimizers with CUDA? I can't remember if this was finally implemented?
